title: Wind Cave National Park: Physical / Mobility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Physical / Mobility              Physical / Mobility         Ranger Mary Laycock with Special Tour      Limited areas of the cave are accessible to wheelchairs and folks with limited mobility. Please call ahead to make arrangements or ask at the information desk for an Accessible Tour. There are fees charged for these services. Call the park 605-745-4600 for more information. Tour Fees        Age 17-61 $5.00   Age 6-16 $2.50   Senior or Access Pass Holders $2.50   Under 6 Free
